ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISBLANK( Commission_Structure__c ), NOT( Partner_Name__c = 'BlueWave Inside Sales'), NOT( Partner_Name__c = 'BlueWave Test Partner'), NOT( Partner_Name__c = 'Perch Inside Sales'), NOT( Partner_Name__c = 'Perch Test Partner'), NOT( Partner_Name__c = 'Placeholder Partner'), NOT( $Profile.Name = 'System Administrator') )
